availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joshua E. Heizer (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Eastland Heizer in Green County, Kentucky, in March 1843. Father of Sarah J. Heizer and William J. Heizer. Married to Martha Lasley Heizer in Green County on July 10, 1854. Father of Thomas E. Heizer, Samuel J. Heizer, Mathew L. Heizer, Mary S. Heizer, and Rhoda E. Heizer. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Green County in 1860.
